array.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a group of people or things, especially one that is large or impressive
array.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: There was a vast array of colours to choose from.
array.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a set of numbers or signs, or of computer memory units, arranged in lines across or down
array.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to wear particular clothes, especially clothes of good quality
array.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: She came in arrayed in all her finery.
array.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to arrange something in an attractive way
array.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: make-up arrayed on the bathroom counter
array.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to put soldiers in position ready to fight
array.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a range of many different things
array.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: avast array of electronic and consumer products
array.translation[2].definitions[1].defi: a set of computer memory units arranged in rows across or down
array.translation[2].definitions[1].exam: a device that stores massive amounts of computer data on arrays of disk drives
